Adjust the sensitivity of the microphone.

TERMS OF USE OF THE APPLICATION

;
1. ACCEPTANCE OF CONDITIONS OF USE


When you install the APPLICATION, you accept the terms of use.


2. DEFINITION


2.1. The APPLICATION offers to the user access to an online store (hereinafter SHOP) from which the user can acquire at the price given in the SHOP, existing in the catalog offered by RISING scores. You may download scores you purchased on your device and can be used in two ways: by moving them manually or by selecting a metronome speed from which the score will automatically move throughout the piece.


2.2. The APPLICATIOM is distributed for free. In addition, RISING will publish APPLICATION periodic updates that not accrue any cost to the user.


3. DATA PROTECTION


Any personal information provided to RISING while using the APPLICATION only be used in accordance with the Privacy Policy RISING.


4. LICENSE AND COPYRIGHT


4.1. All trademarks, copyrights, database rights and other APPLICATION intellectual property, whatever its nature, as the source code are property of RISING.


4.2. Hereby RISING offers a revocable, free, nonexclusive and international licence to use this APPLICATION on a personal or professional level within the limits set by these conditions.


5. TERMS OF USE


5.1. The user will not act or allow third parties acting on their behalf to:


a) Make and distribute copies of the APPLICATION. 

 b) Attempting to copy, reproduce, alter, modify, reverse engineer, disassemble, decompile, transfer, exchange or translate APPLICATION. 

 c) Create any kind of project derived from the APPLICATION. 


5.2. The application provides the user free for personal use and not commercial. RISING reserves the right to modify or disable the APPLICATION any time for any reason. 


5.3. You agree that the terms of the agreement with the vendor of your mobile network ("Mobile Service Provider") will continue to apply for the use of the APPLICATION. Accordingly, the Supplier may charge for Mobile Services services connection to the network while the APPLICATION remain connected to the network, or that produce economic positions of others. The user accepts the responsibility of charges that may arise. 


5.4. If the user is not the owner's billing phone or mobile device used to access to the APPLICATION, will assume that you have permission from the owner to use the APPLICATION. 


6. AVAILABILITY


6.1. The application is available for mobile handheld devices operating with Android OS operating systems. RISING will make all reasonable efforts to APPLICATION is available at all time. However, you agree that the APPLICATION delivery will be made through internet and mobile networks and, therefore, the quality and availability of the APPLICATIOM can be affected by factors beyond the control responsible of RISING. 


6.2. To use the APPLICATION, the user must have a compatible mobile device with internet access and meets the minimum specifications ("Software Requirements"). 


6.3. The software requirements are: OS Android Devices over 7 inches and the Android OS 4.1 to OS 4.4 operating systems. Languages: On devices with languages ​​not supported by the APPLICATION, this will be show in English. 


7. ACCOUNT DELETING


3.2.7.1. You are permitted to terminate your account at any time through tool offered in the APPLICATION for this purpose, and without pre notice to RISING. \ n \ n
3.2.7.2. The account deletion by the user is an irreversible process that has result in the removal of all user information contained in the RISING database. This information includes the record of purchases made ​​by the user in the STORE. However, the scores that the user has downloaded to the device have been acquired through the STORE not be removed from the device, but the user must create a new account if want to use. 


3.2.7.3. The account deletion by the user results in loss of balance that had accumulated in your account, as well as the end of their contractual relationship with RISING. 


8. TERMINATION


8.1. RISING may terminate the use of the APPLICATION at any time, previous notice, which will be published on the BLOG. 


8.2. At the end of such use, shall also order all rights and licenses granted to the user, which means that the user must stop using the software.

TERMS OF PURCHASE


1. PURPOSE AND DESCRIPTION OF PRODUCTS


RISING S.C.P. (hereinafter RISING) is the creator and owner of the application Scores (hereinafter, the APPLICATION) offered on the site www.scores.rising.es (hereinafter, the WEB) generated and structured from software, design and content, along with other information both own from reputable suppliers and offers online support (hereinafter STORE) in which the CUSTOMER can purchase sheet music in digital format that can be used by the application itself. This Agreement regulates the provision and supply to the CUSTOMER through the Internet telecommunications network, products by RISING. The products are those that are available through the STORE and in price lists contained in it, reserving however that company the right to amend and revise such rates and products. 


2. GENERAL TERMS


The order by the CUSTOMER of the products of the STORE presupposes the acceptance of these Conditions of Purchase and Terms listed both in the WEB and in the APPLICATION, and is perfected in the moment of the purchase order. 


The presentation of products on the screen itself does not constitute an offer of sale itself from a contractual point of view, but it is merely a showcase of the products available to the STORE. 


3. PRICE


The cost of the products specified in the STORE will be established for each of them and force in each time, which is accessible via the store and displayed on the information attached to the product. RISING reserves the right to change prices at any time, being of application that modification to the parties since it is incorporated into the Web. 


4. ACQUISITION OF CREDIT


4.1. To purchase any of the products available through the SHOP, the CLIENT will available in the STORE an option that will allow to add credit to the CLIENT's account. 


4.2. This option will consist that the CLIENT shall pay to RISING a monetary amount that, after payment, will be posted to the CLIENT account as a virtual credit (hereinafter CREDIT). This is the CREDIT that allow the CUSTOMER to purchase scores in the STORE. 


4.3. If the CLIENT does not have enough CRDIT to purchase a score, can not buy it. In this case, if the CLIENT wish to acquire this score should add more CREDIT into the account. 


4.4. RISING don't handlecCREDIT returns.


5. DELIVERY


The delivery of products purchased will occur immediately after the payment has been made and from the STORE. Additionally, an email will be sent to the client with information of the purchase, as well as the bill itself 


6. RETURNS


Being products and services in digital format and for obvious reasons, no returns allowed. 


7. WARRANTY


In the case of a problem, the purchased product could not be downloaded or was technically defective so it was impossible to read and use, the CLIENT must contact, before 15 days, with RISING (info@rising.es) to request a copy of these products. RISING provide copies of such products provided only if the claim occurs within the 15 days mentioned. 


In case of loss or corruption of the acquired and paid files in the STORE, RISING provide a new copy the CLIENT and will do up to 3 times as long as the product acquired for the CLIENT is current and not discontinued at the time of the application result. To make this possible delivery, the CLIENT must contact with RISING and provide necessary information how to both product and verification that this was actually purchased in the STORE. 


8. BILLING AND PAYMENT


The CLIENT will make payment of products using the payment gateway enabled by RISING and managed by an specialized entity. Payment is made on a secure server. At the time of payment, RISING emits and sends the bill to the email address provided by the CLIENT. For security reasons, RISING does not store data of payment in any form, leaving the entire purchase process by the entity. RISING just received, by the entity, the authorization code or failing the cause of failure of the operation (card denied, expired, etc..). 


9. JURISDICTION AND APPLICABLE LAW


9.1. The present Terms shall be governed by the provisions of Spanish legislation.


9.2. In the case that any discrepancy or dispute arising from the interpretation or Application of these Terms of Use, RISING and the CLIENT expressly waiving any other jurisdiction he could be entitled, subject to the jurisdiction of the Courts and Tribunals of RISING address. And in the case that the CLIENT is resident outside of Spain, RISING and CLIENT expressly waive any other jurisdiction that may apply, subject to the jurisdiction of the Courts of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria.
